apps.name: Played
apps.subtitle: Track your gaming journey
apps.localizedDescription:
Played is your personal game tracker. Add games from IGDB, track what you're playing, manage your backlog, and sync with Google Drive.

Features:
• Search and add games from IGDB database
• Track playing, completed, and backlog games
• See crack status for games
• Create custom game lists
• Export/Import with CSV
• Google Drive backup & sync
• Steam reviews with ratings
• Smart Lists powered by AI
• Conversational AI commands

versions.localizedDescription:
UI & Steam Fixes

• Fixed Steam 'data couldn't be read' error with proper error handling
• Fixed Game Detail header overflow issue
• Smart Lists now appear below Library and Lists sections
• AI button now available on all tabs (Discover, Backlog, Playing)
• New conversational AI interface (ChatGPT-like)
• Improved Steam error messages

AI Features & Bug Fixes

• Smart Lists: AI-generated dynamic lists like 'Games to Finish', 'Highly Rated Backlog'
• AI Commands: Tell the app what to do with natural language
• Enhanced Statistics: Completion rate, favorite genre, average rating insights
• Fixed IGDB 'Invalid Response' error
• Fixed Steam Reviews parsing
• Fixed Game Details layout width

Bug Fixes

• Fixed IGDB 'Invalid Response' error on Discover page
• Fixed Steam Reviews 'data couldn't be read' error
• Reduced blur intensity on game detail header
• Improved layout for game title display
• Better error messages for API issues

Game Details Improvements

• Synced UI: Discover and Library now have identical game details
• Premium Steam Reviews: Summary card, emoji ratings, review tabs
• Manual Steam ID: Enter Steam App IDs manually for debugging
• Hero Images: Fixed screenshot enlargement animation
• Haptic Feedback: Tactile feedback throughout the app
• Bug Fixes: Re-add game after removal, removed Paused from add picker

iOS 26 Full Compliance

• Observable: Migrated all services from Combine to Observation framework
• Liquid Glass: Updated to .glassEffect() for iOS 26 design
• Navigation: Migrated all views to FlowStack and LiquidList
• Import UI: Real-time progress with game count and IGDB lookup
• Performance improvements and code modernization
Initial release with custom list integration, Steam reviews fix, auto cover refresh, and pull-to-refresh crack status.
